title: Thursday Post Show (8-19-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (8-19-21)
description:
Bobby starts the show by signing a book for a listener and talking to Eddie about how he is planting the seed of their career paths. Bobby said his mom was disappointed that he didn’t become a doctor. Eddie also says he gave a babysitter a check and she didn’t know what to do with it. Mike D asks Bobby questions to see how he’s changed after being married after 1 year. Amy also talks about how she was reluctant to book a flight Spirit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
